title: Spafinder Wellness 365 Announces Finalists for Global Wellness Travel AwardsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Spafinder Wellness 365 Announces Finalists for Global Wellness Travel Awards Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
Reflecting the size and diversity of the rapidly growing wellness travel market, Spafinder Wellness 365™ today announced 273 destination spas, hotels, resorts and retreats have been selected as finalists for the global Wellness Travel Awards. The final candidates for the second annual awards were named across 20 categories by a panel of 33 wellness travel editors and experts, who nominated 504 properties for consideration before narrowing the field to finalists in 53 countries and regions.
This year, more properties located in areas outside North America were nominated and selected as finalists, with a significant increase in Asia-Pacific properties, signaling the rapid growth in the number of exceptional wellness destinations in that region.
“We are grateful to our global panel of travel editors and experts who worked to identify the best in wellness travel from all corners of the world,” said Spafinder Wellness, Inc.® Chief Brand Officer Mia Kyricos. “With dozens of finalists in each of 20 wellness categories, the Awards are an excellent resource for people looking for healthier travel destinations—and for the travel agents who book these unique experiences.”
The Awards program will also honor the top properties on six continents with Crystal Awards and present Country Awards to top winners in scores of countries and regions throughout the world.
Wellness Travel Award winners will be announced in a press release on November 4 from the World Travel Market in London, where a special reception will be held to honor Crystal and Country winners.
Source: Spafinder Wellness
